items.title: Interactive Knowledge Graph of GreenFlux Blog
items.description: Network visualization of blog posts and related tags. Click tags to see related posts and navigate through topics. Built with viz-network.js.

items.title: AI Smiths Podcast Series
items.description: Video Podcast on AI, recorded at DevRelCon NY 2025. Interviews with other DevRel and tech leaders, AI hot takes, and real-world AI use cases and challenges.

items.title: Writing Architect - Michigan State University
items.description: Writing assessment tool developed for MSU study, featured in 4 scientific journals. Funded by grant from the Institute of Education Sciences.

items.title: Appsmith - Friday Tech Workshops
items.description: Weekly series of Appsmith tutorial content on APIs, SQL, JavaScript, and all things Appsmith. 52 videos!

items.title: Safety Clearance Database for Magnet Lab
items.description: Maintenance tracker for high-energy systems in a national laboratory, built in FileMaker Pro. Outstanding review from National Science Foundation.

items.title: GreenFlux, LLC - Founder
items.description: Dev agency focused on Low-code and API integrations. Top Rated Plus (5 ⭐︎) on UpWork - $200k+, Top Seller (5 ⭐︎) on Fiverr.

items.title: Farm Co-op Weekly Harvest List
items.description: AppSheet app for farm co-ops, used by 4 co-ops of ~50 farms to manage weekly harvest lists for market.

items.title: AppSheet Community
items.description: Community freelancer and mentor. 1000+ Posts, 40+ solutions!
